zh: 那样做更快捷。

en: He gave an expeditious answer to an inquiry.
zh: 他对询问给出了迅速的回答。

en: I transcribed the original mimeographed edition into LATEX.
zh: 我把最初的油印版抄写成了LATEX。

en: These may be due to extrinsic constraints that are too restrictive or assembly designs that are physically impossible.
zh: 这些可能是由于过于严格的外部约束或物理上不可能的装配设计造成的。

en: He began an exultation to what he perceived as God.
zh: 他开始对他认为的上帝进行欢呼。

en: His pent-up grudge to the cult exploded into the gunshot death of the former prime minister.
zh: 他对邪教组织长期压抑的怨恨爆发，导致前首相被枪杀身亡。

en: Becoming rivals in love caused the rupture of friendship.
zh: 成为情敌导致友谊破裂。

en: My family eat like locusts and can clear a fridge in half an hour.
zh: 我的家人像蝗虫一样吃饭，半小时就能把冰箱清空。

en: He is a glutton for work.
zh: 他是个工作狂。

en: Life is always in a state of flux.
zh: 生活总是在不断变化。

en: Our plans are in a state of flux.
zh: 我们的计划正在不断变化。

en: Taoism scriptures have many Chinese medicine regimen.
zh: 道教经文有很多中医养生。

en: The Gossamer Years, an English title for the Japanese classical work of literature Kagerō Nikki.
zh: 《蜻蛉日记》，是日本古典文学作品Kagerō Nikki的英文标题。

en: A lack of money makes anyone venal. It's natural.
zh: 缺钱会使任何人变得贪婪。这是很自然的。

en: The person often talked in a didactic manner, so he was disliked by many of us.
zh: 那个人经常以一种说教的方式说话，所以我们很多人都不喜欢他。

en: Because of the COVID, people fear the episodic attack of fever.
zh: 因为新冠疫情，人们害怕间歇性的发烧。

en: Some branches of a tree were coming into my house, so I had to remove them.
zh: 树的一些树枝伸进了我的房子，所以我不得不把它们移除。

en: This criticism in no way militates against a different judgement of another group of works.
zh: 这种批评绝不妨碍对另一组作品做出不同的判断。

en: The claim from the employee about wages may be abrasive to the employer.
zh: 员工关于工资的要求可能会让雇主感到不快。

en: Elation and despair ebbed and flowed in her.
zh: 喜悦和绝望在她心中潮起潮落。

en: The mayor and his companion have been uttering many claptraps to the citizens for a long time.
zh: 市长和他的同伴长期以来一直在向市民们说一些空话。

en: Here contemporary particle physics is pretty much at an impasse.
zh: 目前，当代粒子物理学几乎陷入僵局。

en: I have already left.
zh: 我已经离开了。

en: The woman who is speaking is tall.
zh: 正在说话的那个女人个子很高。

en: The capital of Latvia is Riga.
zh: 拉脱维亚的首都里加。

en: I died of embarrassment when my mother kissed me near my friends.
zh: 当着我朋友的面，我妈亲了我，我尴尬死了。

en: The game was a 2-2 draw.
zh: 这场比赛是2比2平局。

en: I bought the very last one.
zh: 我买了最后一个。

en: How much mince did you buy?
zh: 你买了多少绞肉？

en: I heard something in the bedroom.
zh: 我听到卧室里有动静。

en: Are you at Granny's?
zh: 你在奶奶家吗？

en: The meaning doesn't change.
zh: 意思没有改变。

en: "Are you single?" "Yes, I'm a single father."
zh: “你单身吗？” “是的，我是个单身父亲。”

en: I don't want to talk about that any more.
zh: 我不想再谈论那个了。

en: Tom is the worst of the worst.
zh: 汤姆是最差劲的人。

en: It was so beautiful!
zh: 太美了！

en: I can't sleep. What should I do?
zh: 我睡不着。我该怎么办？

en: This dog is cute.
zh: 这只狗真可爱。

en: I'm going to take a bath now.
zh: 我现在要去洗澡了。

en: I like old things.
zh: 我喜欢旧东西。

en: A bear lives here.
zh: 这里住着一只熊。

en: What other days do you have available?
zh: 你还有哪些日子有空？

en: I don't love you any more.
zh: 我已经不爱你了。

en: He has a quick temper.
zh: 他脾气很暴躁。

en: The airport is forty minutes away from the centre.
zh: 机场离市中心有四十分钟的路程。

en: Mum, why is that lady crying?
zh: 妈妈，那个女士为什么在哭？

en: I listen patiently, but without interest.
zh: 我耐心地听着，但毫无兴趣。

en: You always reject what I suggest.
zh: 你总是拒绝我的建议。

en: I feel nothing at all.
zh: 我感觉什么都没有。

en: How many students are on the list?
zh: 名单上有多少学生？

en: How many passengers are in the car?
zh: 车里有多少乘客？

en: Why didn't Mary accept Tom's gift?
zh: 玛丽为什么不接受汤姆的礼物？

en: The package will arrive on Friday or Saturday.
zh: 包裹将在星期五或星期六到达。

en: I tried to send the birthday card, but the post office wouldn’t accept it, so I’ll send it by email instead.
zh: 我试着寄生日贺卡，但是邮局不收，所以我改用电子邮件发送。

en: This machine is hard to operate.
zh: 这台机器很难操作。

en: I wanna see the afterlife without dying.
zh: 我想在不死的情况下看看来世。

en: It's a bottomless stomach!
zh: 真是个无底洞！

en: Its popularity is skyrocketing!
zh: 它的人气正在飞速上升！

en: There's still hours till dinner.
zh: 离晚餐还有几个小时呢。

en: Why do you threaten people for their money? Might you be having money troubles?
zh: 你为什么为了钱威胁别人？你是不是有经济困难？

en: Here in Heaven, you will all live happily and without any struggles.
zh: 在天堂，你们都会幸福地生活，没有任何挣扎。

en: I think I'll go.
zh: 我想我该走了。

en: I plan to absolutely succeed and become a doctor in the future!
zh: 我计划一定要成功，将来成为一名医生！

en: Sorry, but I'm not a fan of sweets.
zh: 对不起，我不喜欢甜食。

en: Was that my phone ringing?
zh: 刚才是不是我的电话响了？

en: "Why's this medicine powder so sweet? It's like sugar!" "It contains erythritol."
zh: “这药粉怎么这么甜？像糖一样！” “它含有赤藓糖醇。”

en: Many a tears were shed, but no words were spoken.
zh: 流了很多眼泪，但没有说一句话。

en: A boy who sees a squirrel without a place to hide from him who turns to run away decides to chase it.
zh: 一个男孩看见一只松鼠，松鼠无处躲藏，转身逃跑，男孩决定追它。

en: Go there by yourself.
zh: 你自己去那里。

en: Getting home will take us at the very least an hour.
zh: 回家至少要花我们一个小时。

en: Getting home will take you at the very least an hour.
zh: 回家至少要花你一个小时。

en: Every day, we get at the very least three clients at the shop.
zh: 我们店里每天至少有三个顾客。

en: You won't find opportunities like this more than twice a year.
zh: 你一年最多只能找到两次这样的机会。

en: We get at least three customers in our shop every day.
zh: 我们店里每天至少有三个顾客。

en: At least three customers come into our shop every day.
zh: 每天至少有三个顾客光顾我们的商店。

en: Is Santa coming this year?
zh: 今年圣诞老人会来吗？

en: I can't go out dressed like this. Can you wait a little? I'll change right away.
zh: 我不能穿成这样出门。你能等一会儿吗？我马上换。

en: I can finish that project within three weeks at most.
zh: 我最多可以在三周内完成那个项目。

en: I want my own house.
zh: 我想要自己的房子。

en: Where are the coffee beans?
zh: 咖啡豆在哪里？

en: I eat before seven in the evening.
zh: 我晚上七点之前吃饭。

en: Could you help me put these bags into the car?
zh: 你能帮我把这些袋子放到车里吗？

en: Tom is buying the latest faddy VR headset just so that you can watch him use it.
zh: 汤姆买最新的潮流VR头显，只是为了让你看他用。

en: Because of the time difference, I want to call you at a time that works best for the both of us. In terms of Japan time, when are you able to call?
zh: 因为时差的关系，我想在对我们双方都最方便的时间给你打电话。就日本时间而言，你什么时候可以通话？

en: This is my first time in this shop so I don't know what's recommended. Do you have any recommendations you could give me?
zh: 这是我第一次来这家店，所以我不知道有什么推荐的。你有什么推荐可以给我吗？

en: Recently I've been going to this shop a lot. The atmosphere is good, the customers are nice, and it's just really calming. How many years have you been working at this shop? Do you find it rewarding to work here?
zh: 最近我经常去这家店。气氛很好，顾客也很友善，而且真的很放松。你在这家店工作多少年了？你觉得在这里工作有意义吗？

en: The table I'm trying to use is dirty so I'm looking for a tablecloth. Where is one? Could you give me one?
zh: 我想要用的桌子很脏，所以我正在找桌布。哪里有？你能给我一个吗？

en: Since then I’ve asked my school some questions over email, but so far I haven't really had an answer. I’m not really able to trust them now. What do you think I can do to calm things down?
zh: 从那以后，我通过电子邮件向我的学校提出了一些问题，但到目前为止，我还没有真正得到答案。我现在真的无法信任他们。你认为我该怎么做才能平息事态？

en: I was instantly smitten with her—her face, her personality—and wanted to stay with her forever. And I'm really worried about how I can get together with her and how I can prevent other guys from getting to her. Could you please assist me in making this love a reality and making her fall in love with me as well?
zh: 我立刻被她迷住了——她的脸，她的个性——并且想永远和她在一起。我真的很担心我该如何和她在一起，以及如何阻止其他男人接近她。你能帮我实现这段爱情，让她也爱上我吗？

en: I keep wondering how I can improve my English. Sometimes I can't explain what I'm trying to say or what the situation is, or I just can't come up with a good way to describe it myself. How do you think I can improve?
zh: 我一直在想如何提高我的英语水平。有时我无法解释我想说什么或情况是什么，或者我只是想不出一个好的方法来自己描述它。你认为我该如何提高？

en: Something caught my attention recently. I usually say hello or something similar at the start of messages before moving on to the topic of the message. But, surprisingly, I've seen a lot of people dive right into the topic and send nothing else. What's up with that?
zh: 最近有一件事引起了我的注意。我通常在消息的开头说你好或类似的话，然后再进入消息的主题。但是，令人惊讶的是，我看到很多人直接进入主题，什么也不发。这是怎么回事？

en: I've been thinking I might want to engage in small talk with my Uber driver, but I'm not sure what to talk about or what to ask. Could you give me any ideas as to what I should talk about?
zh: 我一直在想我可能想和我的优步司机进行一些闲聊，但我不确定该谈论什么或该问什么。你能给我一些关于我应该谈论什么的想法吗？

en: Change it however you need to.
zh: 随便你怎么改。

en: The long and the short of it is that I was sacked.
zh: 总而言之，我被解雇了。

en: Brazil finished runners-up in the 1998 World Cup.
zh: 巴西在1998年世界杯中获得亚军。

en: Children grow up really fast.
zh: 孩子们长得真快。

en: Your hijab is a lovely color.
zh: 你的头巾颜色真好看。

en: "Are you insane?" "Yes."
zh: “你疯了吗？”“是的。”

en: Why do Muslims memorize the Quran?
zh: 为什么穆斯林要背诵古兰经？

en: Are you learning two foreign languages at the same time?
zh: 你同时在学两门外语吗？

en: Who do you think you are to be grinning like that?
zh: 你以为你是谁，竟然那样咧着嘴笑？

en: Japanese food is very different from anything that I had while growing up.
zh: 日本料理和我从小吃的任何东西都非常不同。

en: Mina became a nurse's aid.
zh: 米娜成了一名护士助理。

en: I guess I don't really feel like travelling.
zh: 我猜我真的不太想旅行。

en: The train crashed into a truck.
zh: 火车撞上了一辆卡车。

en: I clashed with him over the matter.
zh: 我因为这件事和他发生了冲突。

en: I'd like to book a single room.
zh: 我想预订一间单人房。

en: I rang her, but the number was engaged.
zh: 我给她打电话，但电话占线。

en: That was far more complicated than I thought.
zh: 这比我想象的要复杂得多。

en: Tom has been in clinical treatment for addiction for the last five years.
zh: 汤姆在过去的五年里一直在接受成瘾的临床治疗。

en: If you disagree with him, don't be afraid to say so.
zh: 如果你不同意他的观点，不要害怕说出来。

en: I found this book at a second-hand bookshop.
zh: 我在一家二手书店找到了这本书。

en: Prices will go up after 20 October.
zh: 10月20日之后价格会上涨。

en: Our trip was cancelled because of heavy snow.
zh: 由于大雪，我们的旅行被取消了。

en: If anything happens, ring me straight away.
zh: 如果发生什么事，立刻给我打电话。

en: The next meeting will take place on 10 June.
zh: 下次会议将于6月10日举行。

en: When did you arrive? Today?
zh: 你什么时候到的？今天吗？

en: I have a headache but no other symptoms.
zh: 我头疼，但没有其他症状。
